introduction: Debut feature by two young woman directors, both of whom also act in the film. Abe Saori plays Haruo, who visits her old friend Atsuko (Takahashi Nazuki) in Tokyo and takes a casual job in a mahjong parlour run by a blind boss. She finds herself living through a crash course in the violence and danger in human relationships. Dragons & Tigers Award nominee. With two highly original animated shorts from Japan.
